annons.annonsrubrik: Are you our next Web analyst?
annons.annonstext:
We are looking for a highly skilled web analyst who wants to be a part of developing our clients web shop, are you the person we’re looking for?

To our client in Älmhult were looking for a web analyst that will be working in a team that is responsible to attract more customers to our client’s website and to ensure that the customer revisit and shops more frequently. 

Your working task will include:

•	Translate business questions in to analytical requirements and perform analysis to gain insights and identify gainful opportunities.
•	Identify operational opportunities and make recommendations to help improve commercial effectiveness by drilling into data in order to support sales, profitability and conversion rates.
•	Analyse data to drive conversion by optimize commerciality, the ease of shopping and provide recommendations on how to improve our clients offer.
•	Work together with other roles across the organization to define and develop reporting and analysis, based on KPIs, in order to optimize web commerciality and functionality. 
•	Participate in relevant web projects.
•	In close co-operation with consumer insight and market intelligence support a seamless multichannel customer experience. 

We give you the opportunity to work in a creative environment, broaden your experience and, if you are the right person, the opportunity to continue your career within the organization. The position is full time.

Working hours are business hours, with the possibility to some flex. You will either be employed by StudentConsulting but work with our client as a consultant or you will be recruited directly to our client. The workplace is situated in Älmhult and there is an advantage if you live nearby. Due to good public transportation, it is not a complication if you live in Växjö, Malmö, Lund, Hässleholm, Kristianstad or Skåne in general.

Din profil
We are looking for:
•	Good skills in Web analytics and up to date on latest eCommerce and online marketing developments 
•	Knowledge of additional digital intelligence tools such as survey solutions and in-page analytics
•	Good process understanding

You are motivated, have the enthusiasm to develop, learn, and share knowledge and experience. Furthermore, you are interested in home furnishing. You have great presentation skills and you communicate easily in both verbal and written English

The recruitment is an ongoing process, therefore we would like you to send us your application as soon as possible. For other questions about the position Contact: amelie.aronsson@studentconsulting.com

Om företaget
Mångfaldigt prisbelönta StudentConsulting är ett av Skandinaviens ledande rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag med fokus på unga i karriären. Tack vare ett stort nätverk och lång erfarenhet kan vi erbjuda intressanta och utmanande tjänster inom områden som IT, teknik, ekonomi, administration, HR, marknadsföring, kundtjänst, försäljning, industri, produktion, logistik och transport. Hitta din framtid på www.studentconsulting.se redan idag!
